coreAtributes.name: Anal_Chastity_Belt
coreAtributes.description: A simple belt to keep the butt a no-go zone.

displacementText.playerSelf: You remove the anal chastity belt.
displacementText.playerNPC: You remove the anal chastity belt off [npc.Name].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] removes the anal chastity belt from you.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] removes the anal chastity belt from [npc2.name].
